10/10 multiplayer game

You love horror games? good, this game is for you.
You don't like horror games? Good, this game is for you!

I've played quite a few horror games but somehow this feels different. It still has a suspense to it while not going overboard with jumpscares. I can play this for hours, whereas after half an hour playing outlast my heart is about ready to explode.
Gameplay is so much fun and it's very balanced from what I can tell so far.
Another huge plus for this game is that it's both fun solo and with friends!

This game is tons of fun, always gets my heart racing! It's a solid game to play with friends or solo, and it really does a good job of capturing the survival-horror atmosphere. The learning curve isn't too steep, so even though I haven't played a whole bunch, I can tell I've gotten better but still see so many ways to improve. 'Winning' a match as survivor is dependent on the survivors you're playing with, but this game really rewards team play and cooperation. Strongly recommend.

雖然很多人說這遊戲多BUG，確實也是如此。
有些版本對鬼非常不友善，平衡做得不好，有時候Server還會壞掉。

但是我仍然喜歡這款遊戲，人鬼雙修，跟朋友一起玩的時候很快樂。
DLC質素相當高，希望以後遊戲能增加穩定性，少點bug，多收集玩家意見。
아니 오랜만에 플레이했더니 20랭따리 살인마한테 10랭대 생존자들을 붙여주네 매칭이 왜 이 꼬라지냐고
It's honestly a very fun and diverse game. Better with friends, especially in custom matches, but definitely worth a shot!

So lansgam aber sicher.. Könnte ich mal ein Review zu diesem Spiel abgeben. :D
Dead by Daylight, es ist einfach eine Hassliebe. Man verflucht sehr oft dieses Game, aber dennoch spielt man es weiter. Nach all den Jahren hat sich einiges geändert, mal zum positiven, mal zum negativen. Wie es halt bei solchen Spielen ist. 
Es gibt eine Vielzahl an Survivern und Killern, alle haben haben ihre Perks und Hintergrundgeschichten. Ob jetzt selbst ausgedacht oder Lizenz-Zeugs. Eigentlich ist für jeden etwas dabei. :D
Stetig wird irgendwas verbessert.. Oder zumindest versucht. Wenn man so an spezielle Bugs denkt, die einfach seit Monaten schon dabei sind. 
Eine seeehr lange Zeit hat mich dieses Spiel nur noch genervt und angekotzt. Aber sobald man diesen Punkt des Hasses überspringt und sich weniger aufregt, kann es doch mit den richtigen Leuten Spaß machen. Dazu muss man sagen: Ich spiel zu 98% nur Survive with Friends. Selten Killer. Alleine würde ich DbD nicht lange aushalten. 
Ich bin sehr gespannt was noch alles so kommt und mit was für Bugs man noch kämpfen darf. Bisher empfehle ich das Spiel noch. :D
Bellisimo gioco ma tenuto nelle mani sbagliate, veramente buggato

С учётом моего меняющегося мнения, я решил, что ну его к херам, переписывать этот обзор и оставил всё, как есть.

Не буду распинаться насчёт гнойного коммьюнити, отвратительных серверов и хибтоксов - всё куда проще.

Разработчики утверждали, что в следующем апдейте ( который выходит в июне, вместе с новой главой за бабосики, разумеется ) релизнется нормальный подбор игроков в ММ — мол — " мы уже давно тестируем новую поисковую систему, в игре она есть, но юзается сейчас только для сбора информации ".
Возможно я слепой, но в патчноуте я вообще не увидел упоминания об этой системе. ВООБЩЕ.

Меня просто распирает. На убийце у меня ранг держится на 5-8 и НУ СЛИШКОМ часто кидает твитч-стримеров 1-2 рангов в пати и просто задротов, ЖИВУЩИХ В ЭТОЙ ИГРЕ. ( про частых твитч-стримеров — гипербола. это для долбящихся в череп. ) 

На выживших 2-3 ранг и НУ ПОСТОЯННО кидает меня в лобби, где хотя бы один человек будет 20-ым и уровень игры у него соответственный.
А стоит ли говорить, что DBD просто с ума сходит, если у твоего тиммейта ранг на пару единиц ниже/выше? 
Когда у напарника 3 ранг, а у меня 8 - то находит убийц от 1-15 ранга и последних находит ЧАЩЕ.

Такое ощущение, что не ты играешь, а в ТЕБЯ играют, через отверстие между булок.
Мне уже остоебенило сливать катки, потому что новички про игру нихера не знают и просто стоят дрочат свои шкафы, пока ты бегаешь. палеты крутятся, генераторы стоят холодненькими — простыми словами.
И дело не в самом нивхерственном нубе, которому ну очень сложно и лень посмотреть гайдики на ютубе, а в том, что тебе их сама игра подкидывает, а вместе с ним — ГОВНА — или же маньяка твоего уровня игры.

DbD можно много за что не любить, но именно за этот жёсткий косяк с поиском я её просто ненавижу.
Так на моих нервах не танцевал никто. В соло играх такая проблема прокает значительно реже, но я в соло попросту не хожу, ввиду отсутствия какой-либо разумной коммуникации.
И кстати о ней : самое весёлое — это наблюдать, как двадцатые ранги чистят злоебучие тотемы на ваншоты ( земля ) и ты им НУ НИКАК НЕ МОЖЕШЬ СООБЩИТЬ, ЧТО ЛОМАТЬ ЕГО НЕЛЬЗЯ, ИНАЧЕ ДАДУТ ПИЗДЫ.
Fun 4 v 1 killer. Check out some youtubers before buying such as Puppers or Monty. They provide decent videos and coverage of the game.

I mean its ok. The grind is unbearable unless you play with friends or use all the farming perks/offerings in the game (killer and survivor). Only issue is after about 200 hours the game becomes just a rank simulator. Not enough dynamics to keep the game unpredictable. However still has a charm that its main competitor Friday 13th cannot offer. Good amounts of updates to keep the game fresh with new characters coming out every 3-4 months. Heavy playing is required to keep up with new releases. 

Overall is a fun game that is fairly priced for the experience you will receive. Some will fall in love with the game, some will hate it. Either way worth a stab in the dark.
its so fun to play with your friends and is really competitive!

1명의 술래와 4명의 생존자의 술래잡기 생존자는 다양한 퍽과 아이템으로 발전기를 돌려 문을따서 탈출하는것이 승리조건이고 술래는 이를 저지하는것이 게임의 내용이다 공유퍽(능력)과 캐릭터별 퍽이 나뉘는데 한 캐릭터를 상당히 높은레벨까지 올려야 해당 캐릭터의 개인퍽을 다른캐릭터도 사용이 가능하기 때문에 1티어 퍽들을 얻기 위해 생각보다 다양한 캐릭터들을 키워야 한다(시간이 많이 소요된다) 가볍게 즐기고 그만둘꺼라면 비추천한다.
게임의 내용은 술래잡기라는 간단한 게임이지만 컨트롤이나 심리전이 난이도가 있는 편이기 때문에 영상을 찾아보고 입문하는것을 추천한다

An okay game. Game balance relies on both killers and survivors not playing optimally, and Devs seemingly don't play their game enough to understand how certain changes may destroy flow of the game.

Cons:
>Frequent lobby disconnects with friends
>Frequent game disconnects when loading
>Penalty for disconnecting (not a problem in itself until the game crashes and you get punished for it
>Devs have stated a primary focus for low-mid skill level players which leads to major imbalances in higher level play
>Devs have admitted to rushing killers, abilities, add-ons, features and seem to be focused on pushing out new content rather than fixing existing problems (yes the Devs do eventually get around to fixing some old problems sometimes but the rate at which they take on these things shows they'd rather put out new stuff than fix the old)
>This horror game is not scary(sorry but, some dude you can see coming a mile away with auditory cues in third person doesn't send most people quivering), but it seems that devs think the game should be scary (as per player surveys)
>New skill based matchmaking system rewards camping/tunneling for killers and avoidance of being a teamplayer for survivors
>Meta perks such as No One Escapes Death, and Boon perks are currently in a state where many players feel the need to run them (NoED largely used by low skill killers because it's widely available and extremely powerful with near 0 drawback, Boons largely used at mid-higher skill due to their strong effects and killer slowdown .
>Map design is all over the place with some maps heavily favoring killers while some heavily favor survivors.
>Playing a survivor with friends can sway balance of the game because of the core mechanics of the game being very limited on communication
>While I do forgive the microtransactions for licensed killers/survivors I cannot forgive yet another crappy "Battlepass". This battlepass expects players to grind for battlepass currency (bpc), 1 battlepass tier requires gaining 10bpc. 1bpc is gained every 2-5 games. There are 70 tiers in the battlepass, that's around 140-350 games. Devs are "Gracious enough" to allow a free version that's totally not just a subconscious, predatory way to advertised the payed version by giving you close to nothing for wasting your time progressing through the tiers.
>While matchmaking has switched over to a new system ("did you get kills/escape" which is directly from an old system that was abandoned because of its many shortcomings, the monthly reset that gives you ingame currency is still based on the emblem system BHVR just left for the "new" skill based matchmaking. If you didn't catch that, BHVR is using 2 systems which we all know and acknowledge does not work for the game.
>DDOS attacks are rampant now with nothing done about it by Devs

Pros:
>Can be quite fun with friends
>Playing killer does well at making you feel very powerful and in control at low-mid skill level games
>Aside from the battlepass, microtransactions in regards to killers/survivors licensed by other creators is rather reasonable in my opinion with only cosmetics being locked behind a paywall (aside from those killers abilities and perks on both killer and survivor (although there is a chance to buy paywalled perks from "shrine of secrets")).


EDIT:
After five full years on the market this can is still in a state of constant repair. As one bug is fixed more bugs are introduced by what can only be considered to be incompetency on the developers part. These halfwits even laugh at the own inadequacy in the year four event and we're supposed to accept this? Until this game has actual focus on bugs and can produce actual results without bringing in new bugs so they can look busy I cannot recommend this game. But as it stands I don't believe that there is enough pressure on the people supposedly fixing the game.
